results.title: Effect of metformin and adriamycin on transplantable tumor model.
results.text_hl: Eighty @CELLLINE_CVCL:4350 @@@BALB/@@@C @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were divided into four equal groups: @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@SEC@@@ group, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@SEC@@@+@CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@adriamycin@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@SEC@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@SEC@@@+@CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@adriamycin@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin augments doxorubicin cytotoxicity in mammary carcinoma through activation of adenosine monophosphate protein kinase pathway.
results.text_hl: This work was designed to examine on molecular level the mode of action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ bearing solid @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@Ehrlich carcinoma@@@ and to evaluate the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in conjunction with @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ as a combined therapy against solid @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@Ehrlich carcinoma@@@.

citations.NLM: El-Ashmawy NE, Khedr NF, El-Bahrawy HA, Abo Mansour HE. Metformin augments doxorubicin cytotoxicity in mammary carcinoma through activation of adenosine monophosphate protein kinase pathway. Tumour Biol. 2017 May;39(5):1010428317692235. PMID: 28459206

results.title: Metformin enhancing the antitumor efficacy of carboplatin against Ehrlich solid carcinoma grown in diabetic mice: Effect on IGF-1 and tumoral expression of IGF-1 receptors.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ enhancing the antitumor efficacy of @CHEMICAL_Carboplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016190 @@@carboplatin@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@Ehrlich solid carcinoma@@@ grown in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@: Effect on @GENE_IGF1 @GENE_16000 @@@IGF-1@@@ and tumoral expression of IGF-1 receptors.

results.title: Metformin extends life span of HER-2/neu transgenic mice and in combination with melatonin inhibits growth of transplantable tumors in vivo.
results.text_hl: The combined treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ significantly suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ehrlich_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002286 @@@Ehrlich tumor@@@ growth (by 40%, p < 0.001).

citations.NLM: Anisimov VN, Egormin PA, Piskunova TS, Popovich IG, Tyndyk ML, Yurova MN, Zabezhinski MA, Anikin IV, Karkach AS, Romanyukha AA.
